text: Hopea recopei is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Cambodia, Laos, Thailand, and Vietnam. It was collected by Pierre, J.B.L. on 03–1867. It is Herbarium Specimens. Hopea recopei is primari located in Dinh ad Baria, austro coch. It was originated in Vietnam, Arbor 35 meter. Its Herbarium is Royal Botanic Gardens. ==References== recopei Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea recopei
